title: Understanding Range
text: The range of a set of data values is the difference between the maximum and minimum values.

title: Using SQL Functions
text: In SQL, you can use the MAX() function to find the maximum value and the MIN() function to find the minimum value in a column.

title: Calculating Range in SQL
text: To calculate the range of data values in the field Total, you need to subtract the minimum value from the maximum value.
